welcome: Welcome, Senpai, to UwU Chan, your Magical Shoppe of Wonders!
invalidBuyCommand: Oopsie-woopsie! That's an invalid buy command. Please use the format: 'buy <product> <quantity>'. Example: 'buy Magical Elixir 3'.
invalidQuantity: Nyaa~! Invalid quantity. Please enter a valid number. Example: 'buy Magical Elixir 3'.
productNotFound: Oh dear! Product '{product}' not found in our mystical inventory.
invalidWalletCommand: Invalid wallet command, Senpai. Please use the format: 'wallet <amount>'. Example: 'wallet add 20.00'.
invalidAmount: Invalid amount, Senpai. Please enter a valid number~! Example: 'wallet add 20.00'.
notEnoughMoney: Nyan~ Senpai, you don't have enough Enchanted Coins in your wallet for this mystical purchase. OwO
walletUpdated: Your magical wallet has been updated! {action} {amount} Enchanted Euro.
exitMessage: Farewell, Senpai! Leaving the enchanting world of UwU Chan's Magical Shoppe.
resetMessage: Resetting the shoppe's enchantments. Welcome back, Senpai!
invalidCommand: Invalid command, Senpai. Available commands: 'buy', 'wallet', 'checkout', 'reset', 'exit', 'stock', 'product'. Type 'help <command>' for detailed information on each command.
walletHelpMessage:
Wallet Commands:
- 'add <amount>': Add Enchanted Coins to your wallet. Example: 'wallet add 50.00'.
- 'remove <amount>': Remove Enchanted Coins from your wallet. Example: 'wallet remove 20.00'.
- 'balance': Check your current wallet balance.
- 'help': Reveal this magical help message~! Example: 'wallet help'.
invalidAddCommand: Invalid add command. Please use the format: 'wallet add <amount>'. Example: 'wallet add 20.00'.
invalidRemoveCommand: Invalid remove command. Please use the format: 'wallet remove <amount>'. Example: 'wallet remove 10.00'.
insufficientBalance: Insufficient Enchanted Coins, Senpai. You don't have enough in your wallet.
invalidWalletSubcommand: Invalid wallet subcommand. Supported subcommands: 'add', 'remove', 'balance'. Example: 'wallet balance'.
helpMessage:
Hello, Senpai! I'm UwU-Chan, your Enchanting Shoppekeeper! OwO
Here are the available commands:
- 'buy <product> <quantity>': Purchase mystical items. Example: 'buy Magical Elixir 3'.
- 'wallet <amount>': Manage your Enchanted Coins. Example: 'wallet add 20'.
- 'checkout': Finalize your shopping and see your magical receipt.
- 'reset': Reset your cart and wallet spells.
- 'exit': Bid farewell to the enchanting world. UwU
- 'stock': Discover the mystical inventory.
- 'product list': Get a list of all product prices.
- 'product <product name>': Retrieve the price and description of a specific product. Example: 'product Magical Elixir'.
helpBuyMessage:
Buy Command:
- 'buy <product> <quantity>': Purchase mystical items. Example: 'buy Magical Elixir 3'.
helpWalletMessage:
Wallet Command:
- 'wallet <amount>': Manage your Enchanted Coins. Example: 'wallet add 20'.
- 'wallet help': Get detailed information about wallet commands.
helpCheckoutMessage:
Checkout Command:
- 'checkout': Finalize your shopping and see your magical receipt.
helpResetMessage:
Reset Command:
- 'reset': Reset your cart and wallet spells.
helpExitMessage:
Exit Command:
- 'exit': Bid farewell to the enchanting world.
helpStockMessage:
Stock Command:
- 'stock': Discover the mystical inventory.
helpProductListMessage:
Product List Command:
- 'product list': Get a list of all product prices.
helpProductMessage:
Product Command:
- 'product <product name>': Retrieve the price and description of a specific product. Example: 'product Magical Elixir'.
